channel.title: [PI]Yell Help. Rep++[PI]
channel.description:
How do I add it so a certain player name has their own certain yell title on PI?
Here is my yell code: http://pastebin.com/68kW3VH3

item.title: [PI]Yell Help. Rep++[PI]
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

[quote=“Impious Lols, post:8, topic:366398”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=462595.msg3384249#msg3384249 date=1288311157]
You could try something like

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { if (playerCommand.length() >= 6) { c.sendMessage("The message you entered is to short!"); return; } String Title = "[Player] "; if (playerRights == #) Title = "[What ever goes here] "; yell(Title + playerName + ": " + playerCommand.substring(5)); } } }
[/quote]
This has nothing to do with player rights; I want it only for that username…[/quote]

Shouldn’t it be defined the same way the “Admin” “Mod” etc was stated?

Anyway on topic

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { if (playerCommand.length() >= 6) { c.sendMessage("The message you entered is to short!"); return; } String Title = "[Player] "; if (playerRights == #) Title = "[What ever goes here] "; yell(Title + playerName + ": " + playerCommand.substring(5)); } } }

As he said could be defined instead as

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { if (playerCommand.length() >= 6) { c.sendMessage("The message you entered is to short!"); return; } String Title = "[Player] "; if (playerName == #) Title = "[What ever goes here] "; //playerName might have a different name depending on what its defined as in the server ^^ yell(Title + playerName + ": " + playerCommand.substring(5)); } } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Yell Help. Rep++[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

It was an example dude… try learning some common sense

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) Title = "[] ";

Read full topic
